page.title: 01A description of our D Block
page.content: There are two valleys in our survey area the Rhymney and Deri valleys .In New Tredegar there was a pit called Elliot Pit, now there is a school called Elliot Town Primary School. Near the school there is a disused Winding House. There are factories in New Tredegar producing: plastic chairs etc. and chemicals.On the other side of the river there is a railway track that runs from Rhymney to Cardiff.There used to be a railway track running through the valley but this is now part of a park.There are three villages in New Tredegar, Cwmsyfiog, Elliot Town and Phillipstown.There are six primary schools in our area.There are two rivers,and these join just South of our survey area.Over 99% of the population are English speaking,the remainder are Welsh speaking.
